title: Quinn forever in valor form
body: stuck in valor form and ult cooldown wont go past 140 seconds. when i die i respawn and am still in valor form and cant level up my ult past level 1 either. I believe this was caused by being eaten by tahm kench while in valor form

replies.body:
Hello! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are working on a fix. ^-^

This just happened to me as well! I went into bird form (r) and then was devoured by a Tahm Kench. When he spit me out though I was stuck in Valor form. Tried to disconnect and reconnect and nothing happened. Please fix!
now that i think about i remember being eaten by a tahm kench aswell
